titleStmt.title: A vvife, not ready made, but bespoken, by Dicus the Batchelor, and made up for him by his fellow shepheard Tityrus. In four pastorall eglogues.
titleStmt.author: Aylett, Robert, 1583-1655?

editionStmt.edition: The second edition: wherein are some things added but nothing amended.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
